games.name: Boom Blox
games.description: Started with the throwing Boom Blox games, and the Married Team ended with a score 3,616 to the Unmarried Team's 2,859. In the second round we played the attack games, and the Unmarried Team beat the Married Team 6-2. In the final battle it was a grab game, but our non-dominate hands! The Unmarried Team pulled it out in the end with 161 vs the Married Team's 100.

games.name: Dart
games.description: Played the best two out of three games of 301. The Unmarried Team beat the Married Team in the first and third games for the win.
